note_text: Pt complains of cough and fever for 2 days. Temp 38.5 C. No SOB. Prescribed Paracetamol 500 mg OD PRN.
HTN f/u. BP 156/96, HR 84. On amlodipine 5 mg OD but missed doses last week. Add telmisartan 40 mg OD. Salt restriction counselled. FU 2 weeks.
DM2 f/u. FBS 172. On metformin 500 BD. Plan: increase dose. HbA1c advised. Diet/exercise counselled. FU 4 weeks.

ground_truth.advice: Diet/exercise counselled; plan to increase metformin dose

note_text: Complaint: burning micturition x 3 days + frequency. No fever/chills. No flank pain. Vitals: BP 122/76, HR 86, Temp 98.4F. Mild suprapubic tenderness. Dx: Acute uncomplicated UTI. Urine routine + culture advised. Rx: Nitrofurantoin 100 mg BD x 5 days. Fluids. FU 5–7 days.

ground_truth.findings: Mild suprapubic tenderness; no fever/chills; no flank pain

note_text: C/o cough 1 week with wheeze, worse at night. No fever. SpO2 95%, HR 92. Chest: bilateral wheeze. Neb given in clinic, improved. Rx: Budesonide-formoterol inhaler 2 puffs BD. Salbutamol inhaler PRN. FU 5 days. ER if severe breathlessness.

ground_truth.findings: Bilateral wheeze; no fever; improved after nebulization

note_text: Complaint: epigastric burning after meals, nausea. No vomiting, no melena. Vitals: BP 118/74, HR 78. Dx: GERD. Rx: Pantoprazole 40 mg OD before breakfast x 14 days. Avoid spicy food/caffeine. FU 2 weeks.

Ear pain right side x 2 days, mild fever. Temp 99.8F. Otoscopy: TM congested. Dx: Acute otitis media. Rx: Amoxicillin 500 mg TID x 5 days; Paracetamol 650 mg SOS (max 3/day). FU 3 days if no improvement.
Knee pain x 3 months, worse on stairs. No trauma. Exam: crepitus. Dx: Knee OA. X-ray knee AP/lat advised. Rx: Diclofenac SOS after food. Physio + weight reduction counselled. FU 4 weeks.

ground_truth.advice: Physiotherapy; weight reduction; take after food

note_text: Recurrent headache with photophobia, 6 months, episodic. No focal deficits. Dx: Migraine. Rx: Sumatriptan 50 mg at onset, max 2 tabs/day. Sleep hygiene. FU 6 weeks.

Fatigue, easy tiredness x 1 month. Pallor present. Hb 9.2. Dx: Iron deficiency anemia (provisional). Tests: CBC, ferritin, B12, stool occult blood. Rx: Ferrous sulfate 100 mg elemental OD x 8 weeks. FU 4 weeks.
Itchy ring-shaped rash on trunk x 2 weeks. Dx: Tinea corporis. Rx: Clotrimazole 1% cream apply BD. Keep area dry. FU 2 weeks.
Sore throat, mild fever x 3 days. Temp 100.2F. Throat: erythema, no exudate. Dx: Viral pharyngitis. Rx: Paracetamol 500 mg TID PRN, warm saline gargles. FU if worsens.
Back pain x 2 weeks, dull ache, worse on bending. No radiation. Exam: mild paraspinal tenderness. Dx: Mechanical low back pain. Rx: Ib uprofen 400 mg TID SOS after food. Hot fomentation. FU 2 weeks.

complaints: Back pain (dull ache, worse on bending)
ground_truth.advice: Hot fomentation; take ibuprofen after food
